name: Wall Eraser
description:
My first published prototype. Yeah! Please leave any feedback or comments. Much appreciated! Have a nice day.

Shoot the cubes with matching colored balls. Left click to shoot and right click to switch color.

Prototype created as part of the Unity Counting Prototype Tutorial. I've tried to include most of the things learned so far in the pathway. The most research went into figuring out, how to change the particle color to match the selected ball color.

Some included features...

  • Music and gameplay sounds
  • Simple color selection menu
  • Restricted camera look angles
  • Title, game and game over screens
  • Two win conditions (time or erasing all cubes)
